usefulItems: fine sieve, serving dish, large bowl
title: Peking Chicken

ingredients.content: 40 g spring onions, cut in lengths (3 cm)
20 g fresh root ginger, peeled and cut in round slices (2 mm)
600 g chicken breasts, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place spring onions, ginger and sesame oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté, without measuring cup, <b>3 min/Varoma/speed <b>.
Add carrots and chop <b>7 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula then chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>.

Add water and soy sauce. Insert simmering basket and weigh in chicken. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh in mushrooms, then cover and steam <b>15 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Set Varoma aside and remove simmering basket with aid of spatula.

Add cooked chicken, steamed mushrooms, beansprouts and curry paste then cook <b>6 min/100°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, place noodles in a large bowl, fill with boiling water and allow to soften as per packet instructions. Drain noodles through a fine sieve then place on a serving dish. Arrange chicken and mushroom mixture over the top and serve immediately.
